attributes.action: give a decent tax relief to married couples without any children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many couples do not have children and are tired of subsidising schools and childrens needs, these couples will never benefit from this as they cannot or choose not to have children, therefore they do not put any further strain on the system.

Married couples without children should get tax relief, it would also help reduce the number of young offenders as there would be less children roaming the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
